CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Mutagenic
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a chaotic mix of DNA and mechanites that aerosolizes on impact. The mist can mutate any organics caught in it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: mutanite arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The arrow head is made from mutanite which mutates the victim.
